comment.label_en: The "Users to notify" is used for system defined users and groups.It gets updated automatically with respective site coordinators when any site is removed/added on the document.

list.assistance_dql: SELECT distinct object_name AS name, locale_value as label_en FROM d2_dictionary_value WHERE dictionary_name = 'GMP Training Roles' and object_name in (select b.object_name from d2_dictionary_value a, d2_dictionary_value b, dm_relation r where a.dictionary_name = 'GMP Applicable Areas' and a.object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_areas)) and a.r_object_id = r.parent_id and b.r_object_id = r.child_id and r.relation_name = 'D2_TAXONOMY') and locale_value is not nullstring order by locale_value enable(ROW_BASED)
select user_name as name, user_name as display_label from dm_user where user_name in (select i_all_users_names from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_gmp_all_users') order by 2

combo.assistance_dql: select distinct document_version from cd_training_record where object_name = '$value(object_name)' order by 1

comment.label_en: Selecting the Training Completed Before Effective requires that ALL users complete their training tasks before the document will be transitioned to Effective.
